_xResult.title: Downtown Carriage Pants
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made cotton pants with wide leg
_xResult.longdesc:
A 95 cotton and 5 elastane blend is the perfect match for these made to measure wide leg trouser pants. Comfortable with a bit of stretch, these made to measure black pants have the perfect amount of flow and stretch. Super simple with a regular rise waistband, these pants will be your new go-to for work and play.

 

The pants are customized for lenght, waist, hips and thigh measurements. Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
